alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Delaware (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 10:49PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Buchanan and northwestern Delaware Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1048 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Aurora to near Quasqueton to Center Point. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Winthrop, Quasqueton, Lamont, Rowley, Aurora, Dundee, Masonville, Stanley, Winthrop Golf Course, Delaware County Fairgrounds, Manchester Airport, Monti, Coffins Grove Park, Backbone State Park and Jakway Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
